title: The Bagman
description: Run, run, as fast as you can… In the midst of World War II, Abigail is deposited at St Winifred’s Orphanage for Wilful, Wicked and Wayward children. She is told of the Bagman and how he will get her if she misbehaves. But Abigail must escape and find her estranged twin, Tabitha. Besides, she doesn’t believe in the Bagman.But he believes in her. The Bagman challenges her to play his Game. He will give her seven wishes to be used in seven days. Abigail accepts. Her plans of escape can finally be realised. And she can find her twin. But this is a Bagman’s game. And you should be afraid of Bagmen…
author: Rachael Rippon
